PrecisAuthority to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers authorizing the Hon. Michael Wilson to sign a Convention with the Government of the UNITED MEXICAN STATES for the Avoidance of Double Taxation and the Prevention of Fiscal Evasion with Respect to Taxes on Income.
